mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.itemtype AS "itemtype", a.unitname AS "unitname", a.year17 AS "year17", a.year18 AS "year18", a.year19 AS "year19", a.year20 AS "year20", a.year21 AS "year21", a.year22 AS "year22", a.year23 AS "year23", a.year24 AS "year24", a.year25 AS "year25", a.year26 AS "year26", a.pkincocalmth AS "fea_incocalmethod.id"
LEFT JOIN fea_incocalmethod b ON b.id = a.pkincocalmth
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fea_incocalmethod_t( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, itemtype, unitname, year17, year18, year19, year20, year21, year22, year23, year24, year25, year26, pkincocalmth ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{itemtype}, #{unitname}, #{year17}, #{year18}, #{year19}, #{year20}, #{year21}, #{year22}, #{year23}, #{year24}, #{year25}, #{year26}, #{fea_incocalmethod.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fea_incocalmethod_t SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, itemtype = #{itemtype}, unitname = #{unitname}, year17 = #{year17}, year18 = #{year18}, year19 = #{year19}, year20 = #{year20}, year21 = #{year21}, year22 = #{year22}, year23 = #{year23}, year24 = #{year24}, year25 = #{year25}, year26 = #{year26}, WHERE id = #{id}
